From: ' 
To: Gloria Allred  
Cc: ' 
Subject: Re: Urgent! ,an Epstein victim, just told me that she was able to get child care 
and would like to fly to New York for the hearing Tuesday. What is your telephone number, 
so that I can call you a.s.a.p.? 
Date: Sun, 25 Aug 2019 18:21:17 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.png; image002.jpg 
Thanks very much. Sorry if missed it, but would you also please send me her DOB? 
On Aug 25, 2019, at 2:18 PM, Gloria Allred < > wrote: 
On her driver's license it states on one line and then on the next line below it, 
working on a Sunday to assist =with her travel from Las Vegas to New York tomorrow. 
Gloria Allred 
Allred Maroko & Goldber 
www.amglaw.com 
www. gloriaallred. corn 
<image001.png> 
<image002.jpg> 
From: 
Sent: Sunday, August 25, 2019 7:43 AM 
To: Gloria Allred 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Urgentl= ,an Epstein victim, just told me that she was able to get child care and would like to fly 
to New York for the hearing Tuesday. What is your telephone number, S so that I can call you a.s.a.p.? 
Thanks again for 
Thanks Gloria. I've reminded about the previous booking but have not heard back. Please do send me that 
information when you can, just in case still needs it. 
On Aug 25, 2019, at 10:35 AM, Gloria Allred wrote: 
Thank you very much, . =I would like to fly from Las Vegas to New York tomorrow morning. 
booked last flight to New York to meet with you, so she should have a copy of her driver's license.,which my 
assistant,Diane , had sent to her for travel for that meeting. If not, I had told =I that I would speak to her at noon 
pacific today re her travel and I can get it then. I will also try to reach her earlier, but I know that she is not available 
until later this morning. 
Gloria Allred 
EFTA00020080

Allred 
Maroko 
& 
Gold ber

From: 
Sent: Sunday, August 25, 2019 7:21 AM 
To: 
Cc: Gloria Allred 
Subject: Re: Urgent!= ,an Epstein victim, just told me that she was able to get child care and would like to 
fly to New York for the hearing Tuesday. What is your telephone number, S so that I can call you a.s.a.p.? 
Gloria, 
is going to try to book this flight, but she asked me to confirm what airport she will be flying from, her name 
exactly as it appears on her ID, and her DOB. Would you please send me that information? 
Thanks, 
On Aug 25, 2019, at 8:53 AM, 
Hi Gloria, 
wrote: 
We will try to connect with today to see if we can sort this out. It's possible we won't be able to make 
arrangements this late, but we will do our best and we understand the time sensitivity. Thanks for reaching out. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 25, 2019, at 1:41 AM, Gloria Allred < 
> 
wrote: 
Is there a cell number for that I can call to make travel arrangements for IMI? I sent the email 
below and left a voice mail for her on her office phone but she did not respond. I understand . 
It is the weekend ,but is there a way that I can reach her or another agent to arrange trip from Las Vegas to 
New York on Monday morning ? It would mean so much to her to attend the hearing and does not have 
funds to pay for the flight and get reimbursed after that. 
Gloria Allred 
Allred Maroko & Goldber 
www.amglaw.corn 
www.gloriaallred.com 
<image001.png> 
<image002.jpg> 
EFTA00020081

Gloria Allred
